Articles.Content:
Hello Kerbonauts, I am Nfeld The Rockteer and I have been playing KSP since about 0.14.

This game has come a long way since then and I am proud to be a part of the KSP community.

I will try to be funny at times so if my jokes make you want to drown me because they are so stupid, take it out on Dildorf Kermin.

Love, Nfeld

In Jeb We Trust.

Welcome to the forums!

I haven't been around quite that long myself, but I'm glad you've decided to step into the wider community! Maybe you could share some of your wisdom gathered over the ages over in the How To or Tutorials forums to help out other new players, or recount your Kerbalnauts' tales of derring-do over in the Mission Reports.

And don't worry about the silly jokes. We've heard a million of 'em around here

Happy landings!
